channel.title: Some cool stuff I've spent my time in on Jo's odyssey
channel.description: Recent content in Some cool stuff I've spent my time in on Jo's odyssey

item.title: QuanTurm
item.description: CREATED BY JOSE TORRE QuanTurm (QT) is a prototype of a post-quantum secure blockchain that runs over Kademlia’s distributed hash table peer to peer network. Index | Intro | Design | How it works | Installation | Use it! | Notes | License | Intro With the recent invention of quantum computers and their computing capacities, many possibilities for development arise as well as threats if their power were to be used for evil purposes.
